contextId.information: Here "heaven" and "earth" refer to the entire universe. AT: "as long as the universe lasts" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
contextId.quote: until heaven and earth pass away

contextId.information: "Lord who rules over heaven and earth." The phrase "heaven and earth" is a merism that refers to all people and things in the universe. AT: "Lord who rules over the whole universe" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
Here "day" and "night" mean complete 24-hour periods. AT: "three complete days" (See: [[:en:ta:vol2:translate:figs_merism]])
